Instructions
* You are in %3 team.
* Attacking or stealing from other %4 players is FORBIDDEN.

Instructions
* You are in %3 team.
* You are FREE TO ATTACK ANYONE.
* No VOIP/VON in GLOBAL
* The server does restart unexpectedly.

Welcome to dp Wasteland - ArmA 3.
Please report any bugs/problems to dp-clan.enjin.com
Server will restart whenever needed.

Team killing is against the rules!
If this was a mistake then you must explain yourself and say sorry, otherwise they will mark you as team-killer and you will get kicked or ultimately banned.

1. Keep bad language to a minimum and keep native language to group chat. If you have a problem with another player, take it to direct.
2. NO VOIP IN GLOBAL. We have a public TeamSpeak for players to use.
3. Team killing or stealing from team mates when you are BLUFOR or OPFOR is forbidden and punishable. Play as Independent if you want to be free for all.
4. Revealing information about your (ex)team to other teams is strictly forbidden
5. Do not exploit R3F or any other add-ons or you will be banned.
6. Using or spamming with loud\long custom sound commands will cause punishment up to permanent ban
